dt-option.name: scroller.label
dt-option.summary: Display a label while user is scrolling with the scrollbar

type.description: * `true` show the label when scrolling * `false` do not show

dt-option.default: Label is displayed when scrolling using the scrollbar
dt-option.description: While scrolling using the scrollbar, a label is displayed to indicate the user the approximate position displayed within the whole dataset

example.title: Do not display label when scrolling using scrollbar
